root.name: Desert Kingdom Portable
root.description: Plot Aspashia is a genie princess, lived at a magic Kingdom EVUU who had a human mother which is the probability the cause of her magic power disappearance at the age of 15 years old. In order to make her magic appear again, shes going to Earth and end up landed at a deserted kingdom. To get her magic back, she need to complete a quest and that is to grant human wish. Genie called Unbala Bopper was sent by his father to protect her in her journey to grant human wishes. If she cannot get back her magic power, she will remain become a human for the rest of her life.
